title: Handle Copyright Claim on a User's Live Stream
description: During a user's live stream on a platform like Twitch, an automated system detects copyrighted music being played in the background and issues a copyright strike.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the automated copyright detection alert for the user's stream.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the details of the claim, including the copyrighted song and the rights holder.

tasks.description: Automatically mute the audio on the user's live stream to prevent further infringement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully mutes the stream's audio.

tasks.description: Send a notification to the user explaining the copyright claim and the action taken.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly informs the user about the issue and how to resolve it.
